home.heroTitle: Guides & community for Italians in the UK
home.heroSubtitle: Practical, hand-checked advice and city picks — by people who’ve done it before.
home.communitySub: Fresh, practical and free. No fluff—just what you need to move forward.
home.aboutBody: Resinaro started as a volunteer effort to make life in the UK less confusing for Italians. Today, we publish hand-checked guides and local picks, shaped by real experiences and feedback.
home.howSub: Content you can rely on — researched, tested and written in plain language.
home.whatReadersSub: Short and honest notes from people who used our guides and picks.
home.trustedSub: We work alongside local groups and institutions.
